title: CrystalDiskInfo (CDI) 2.5.2
description:
Copied from Crystal Dew World Homepage:


CrystalDiskInfo is a HDD/SSD utility which supports S.M.A.R.T.

* Supports a part of external USB/IEEE 1394 disks
* Monitoring health status and temperature
* Graph of S.M.A.R.T. information
* Control AAM/APM settings


Unsupported Controller

* ATI AHCI Compatible RAID Controller (AHCI) [SB600/SB700]



Supported Controller

CrystalDiskInfo works well on the almost internal ATA controller.


Microsoft


* Standard Dual Channel PCI IDE Controller

* Standard AHCI 1.0 Serial ATA Controller (AHCI)  


Intel


* Intel(R) ICH10R SATA AHCI Controller

* Intel(R) ICH9R/DO/DH 4 port Serial ATA Storage Controller 1 - 2920
* Intel(R) ICH9 Family 2 port Serial ATA Storage Controller 2 - 2926
* Intel(R) ICH9 SATA AHCI Controller

* Intel(R) ICH8R/ICH9R SATA RAID Controller 

* Intel(R) 82801HEM/HBM SATA AHCI Controller [ICH8]
* Intel(R) 82801GBM/GHM (ICH7-M Family) Serial ATA Storage Controller - 27C4 
* Intel(R) 82801GB/GR/GH (ICH7 Family) Serial ATA Storage Controller - 27C0
* Intel(R) 82801GB Serial ATA Storage Controllers - 27C0
* Intel(R) 82801EB Ultra ATA Storage Controllers
* Intel(R) 82801DB Ultra ATA Storage Controller - 24CB [ICH4] 
* Intel(R) 82801DBM Ultra ATA Storage Controller - 24CA [ICH4-M]
* Intel(R) 82801BA Ultra ATA Controller [ICH2]

* Intel(r) 82371AB/EB PCI Bus Master IDE Controller 


NVIDIA


* NVIDIA nForce Serial ATA Controller (AHCI)
* NVIDIA nForce 590/570/550 Serial ATA Controller

* NVIDIA nForce4 Serial ATA RAID Controller [Does not support RAID Disk]
* NVIDIA nForce4 Serial ATA Controller

* NVIDIA nForce4 Parallel ATA Controller

* NVIDIA nForce3 250 Parallel ATA Controller (v2.6)  


Others


* WinXP Promise Ultra100 TX2 IDE Controller

* VIA VT6421 RAID Controller

* Silicon Image SiI 0680 ATA/133 Controller

* Silicon Image SiI 3114 SATALink Controller
* Silicon Image SiI 3132 SATALink Controller

* Silicon Image SiI 3512 SATARaid Controller

* ATI 4379 Serial ATA Controller [ATI SB400]
